revision.text: ==The Legendary Beasts== '''Note:''' After fulfilling the prerequisites, this quest can be accepted in the Bulletin Board in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ The Legendary Beasts ! Type !! Requirement !! Reward |- | Prerequisite || Defeat [[Gyms#Johto|Ecruteak City's Gym]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Eusine in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Unlocks [[Burned Tower]] |- | Clear Dungeon || Clear [[Burned Tower]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Pokéfan Derek in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Raikou [[File:Raikou.png|30px]] and Entei [[File:Entei.png|30px]] start [[Roaming Pokémon|Roaming]] Johto |- | Capture Pokémon || Catch Raikou [[File:Raikou.png|30px]], Entei [[File:Entei.png|30px]] and Suicune [[File:Suicune.png|30px]] || Unlocks Ho-Oh [[File:Ho-Oh.png|30px]] in [[Burned Tower]] |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
